name: Ra
temple_description: Ra was the Sun God in ancient Egyptian mythology and the head of the nine pillar gods of Heliopolis. She was the most important god in ancient Egypt. She created all the lives of ancient Egypt by reciting each real name. Her divine powers were extremely powerful and she is one of Apep's opponents.

active_skills.name: Eye of Ra
active_skills.effect: If the enemy is not killed, Ra attacks again (up to 8 times). If the enemy is killed within the first three hits, Ra enters [Frenzy] state and becomes immune to debuffs.

active_skills.name: Solar Storm
active_skills.effect: 50% chance to [Ignite] for 3 rounds. If [Ignite] is active, the targets are also stunned for 1 round.

exclusive_ur_plus_skills.name: Flare Reborn
exclusive_ur_plus_skills.effect: If Ra is in the front row: +200 SPD and +50% True DMG. If in the back: +30% DMG.
